• Confirm	if	you	are	carrying	
more than one baby.
• Detect some abnormalities, 
particularly in your baby’s 
head or spine.
• Show the position of your 
baby and your placenta. 
Sometimes a caesarean 
section	is	recommended	–	
for example if your placenta
